report_title: Social Impact & Governmental Applications of IIIT-H Research
report_description: This analysis highlights the significant potential of IIIT Hyderabad's research portfolio to address critical challenges in the public sector. The following applications demonstrate how these advanced technologies can be leveraged to improve public health, safety, infrastructure, accessibility, and governance.

applications.title: Automated Road Safety Audits for National Highways
applications.application_description: Deploying a system on government vehicles (e.g., mail trucks, maintenance fleets) to automatically detect and log missing or damaged traffic signs, creating a real-time audit of road infrastructure safety.
applications.relevant_research: CueCAn: Cue Driven Contextual Attention For Identifying Missing Traffic Signs on Unconstrained Roads

applications.title: Data-Driven Policy Making for Road Safety
applications.application_description: Using Al to analyze public social media data to identify when, where, and why distracted driving occurs. This data can inform targeted public safety campaigns and transportation policies to reduce accidents.
applications.relevant_research: Driving the Last Mile: Characterizing and Understanding Distracted Driving Posts on Social Networks

applications.title: Enhancing National Air Defence and Surveillance Accuracy
applications.application_description: Integrating a machine learning-based error correction module into the Indian Air Force's existing Multi-Sensor Tracking (MST) systems to significantly improve the accuracy of air surveillance, reducing false alarms and enhancing national security.
applications.relevant_research: CB+NN Ensemble to Improve Tracking Accuracy in Air Surveillance

applications.title: Proactive Cybersecurity for Government Digital Infrastructure
applications.application_description: Protecting critical government web applications (e.g., tax portals, citizen service websites) by implementing an intelligent defense system that constantly changes server configurations to proactively thwart cyberattacks.
applications.relevant_research: Factored MDP based Moving Target Defense with Dynamic Threat Modeling

applications.title: Coordinated Drone & Robot Response for Disaster Management
applications.application_description: Developing a command-and-control system for the National Disaster Response Force (NDRF) that uses multi-agent Al to coordinate a swarm of drones and robots for search, rescue, and mapping in disaster zones.
applications.relevant_research: Multi-Agent Systems for Disaster Management

applications.title: Real-time Sign Language Generation for Public Broadcasts
applications.application_description: Integrating an automatic speech-to-sign language generation system into public broadcasters like Doordarshan and All India Radio. This would provide real-time Indian Sign Language interpretation for news and official announcements, making them accessible to the deaf and hard of hearing community.
applications.relevant_research: Towards Automatic Speech to Sign Language Generation

applications.title: Communication Restoration for Patients in Public Hospitals
applications.application_description: Providing low-cost, Al-powered communication devices in public hospitals for patients who have lost their ability to speak (e.g., due to laryngectomy or ALS). This technology can generate speech from silent lip movements or even subtle vibrations.
applications.relevant_research: Towards Accurate Lip-to-Speech Synthesis in-the-Wild & StethoSpeech: Speech Generation Through a Clinical Stethoscope Attached to the Skin

applications.title: Bridging the Digital Divide with Local Language Content
applications.application_description: An initiative to automatically generate encyclopedic and educational content (like Wikipedia articles or textbook chapters) for India's low-resource languages by summarizing existing information from high-resource languages like English. This directly supports the National Education Policy's focus on mother-tongue instruction.
applications.relevant_research: XWikiGen: Cross-lingual Summarization for Encyclopedic Text Generation in Low Resource Languages

applications.title: Fair Budget Allocation for Municipal Projects
applications.application_description: A decision-support tool for municipal corporations that uses principles of proportional fairness to allocate public funds and resources across different wards or communities, ensuring more equitable development.
applications.relevant_research: Proportional Aggregation of Preferences for Sequential Decision Making

applications.title: Digital Tools for Public School Speech Therapists
applications.application_description: A software platform for speech-language pathologists in government schools to automatically detect and analyze stuttering in students. This provides objective, quantitative reports to aid in diagnosis and track therapy progress, especially in resource-constrained settings.
applications.relevant_research: Stuttering Detection Application

applications.title: Digitization of National Archives and Land Records
applications.application_description: A comprehensive OCR pipeline to digitize India's vast archives of historical manuscripts and, critically, handwritten land records. This would make them searchable, preserve cultural heritage, and help to resolve land ownership disputes.
applications.relevant_research: SeamFormer: High Precision Text Line Segmentation for Handwritten Documents & ICDAR 2023 Competition on Indic Handwriting Text Recognition

applications.title: Dynamic Traffic Routing for Urban Pollution Control
applications.application_description: A smart traffic management system for metropolitan areas like Delhi or Bangalore that routes traffic not just to minimize travel time, but to prevent the buildup of severe pollution hotspots, improving urban air quality and public health.
applications.relevant_research: City-Scale Pollution Aware Traffic Routing by Sampling Max Flows Using MCMC

applications.title: Standardized Smart City Infrastructure Planning
applications.application_description: A framework for municipal and state governments to evaluate and choose the best open-source, standards-based IoT platforms for their Smart City projects, ensuring interoperability and avoiding vendor lock-in.
applications.relevant_research: Exploratory Study of oneM2M-based Interoperability Architectures for IoT: A Smart City Perspective

applications.title: Secure Authentication for National Smart Grid Projects
applications.application_description: A highly secure, privacy-preserving authentication protocol for India's national smart grid mission, ensuring that communication between smart meters and the utility is protected from cyberattacks.
applications.relevant_research: Privacy-Preserving Blockchain-Based Authentication in Smart Energy Systems

applications.title: Platform for Participatory Municipal Budgeting
applications.application_description: A civic crowdfunding platform for municipalities that allows citizens to propose and contribute to local public projects (e.g., a new park or community library), using game-theoretic principles to ensure efficient and fair project selection.
applications.relevant_research: Combinatorial Civic Crowdfunding with Budgeted Agents: Welfare Optimality at Equilibrium and Optimal Deviation

applications.title: National Mental Health Trend Analysis from Public Data
applications.application_description: A tool for public health bodies like the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare to analyze anonymized social media data to identify the prevalent causes of depression and anxiety in the population, enabling data-driven mental health policy.
applications.relevant_research: Representation Learning for Identifying Depression Causes in Social Media

applications.title: Public Health Monitoring of Substance Use Trends
applications.application_description: An analytics platform for organizations like the National Drug Dependence Treatment Centre (NDDTC) to monitor social media for discussions about drug use, identifying new trends and the effects of social reinforcement on risk-taking behavior to inform interventions.
applications.relevant_research: Effect of Feedback on Drug Consumption Disclosures on Social Media

applications.title: National English Language Proficiency Programs
applications.application_description: Al-powered tools for national skill development initiatives (e.g., Skill India) to provide accent-aware pronunciation training and assessment for English language learners, improving employability.
applications.relevant_research: A comparative analysis of sequential models that integrate syllable dependency for automatic syllable stress detection & An Investigation of Indian Native Language Phonemic Influences on L2 English Pronunciations

applications.title: Ethical Data Handling Framework for Government Research
applications.application_description: A technical framework and set of tools for government research bodies (like NITI Aayog or ICMR) to use when publishing studies based on public data. The technology helps to 'disguise' text to protect the privacy of individuals while preserving the data's utility.
applications.relevant_research: Towards Effective Paraphrasing for Information Disguise

applications.title: Real-time Social Media Analysis for Public Unrest
applications.application_description: A system for law enforcement and intelligence agencies to analyze dynamic social media graphs in near-real-time. This would help to identify the formation of communities around sensitive events and understand the flow of information during periods of potential public unrest.
applications.relevant_research: Shared-Memory Parallel Dynamic Louvain Algorithm for Community Detection
